description:
A little brother to the groundbreaking Kickr, with all the same technology, but a wheel-on design. The heavy-duty frame and massive flywheel give it a realistic outdoor feel that lets you really hammer. Compatible with a wide range of training apps, so you can climb Mount Ventoux, complete a structured workout or do battle with training partners across the globe – all while it storms outside your house. With power accuracy of +/- 3% and incline simulation up to 12% it will keep your legs challenged.

  • Wheel-on trainer is quick and easy to use
  • Power reading accuracy of +/- 3% for precise training
  • Maximum brake power of 1500W
  • Heavy 4.7 kg (10.5lbs.) flywheel ensures a smooth, realistic ride
  • Heavy-duty frame built for years of hard use
  • Compatible with 130mm and 135mm quick release axles. 142x12mm axles available separately
  • Realistic slope simulation of up to 12%
  • Compatible with road and mountain bike wheel sizes of 650c, 700c, 26in., 27.5in., 29in
  • Front wheel block included
  • Fully compatible with Wahoo Kickr Climb and Wahoo Kickr Headwind accessories, sold separately
  • ERG mode lets you maintain a certain effort level regardless of cadence
  • Controllable by Wahoo app, Zwift, TrainerRoad, Kinomap and many others
  • FE-C and Bluetooth smart control allows you to focus on your training and let the app of your choice change the resistance
  • 60 days free on the SYSTM training app, when you register your KICKR in the Wahoo Fitness app. The Wahoo SYSTM combines personalized workouts, strength training, yoga and mindfulness training, to help you take your performance to the next level
  • Footprint 74 x 66cm (29 x 26in)
name: Wahoo Fitness Kickr Snap Smart Bike Trainer
